'''Radiant Spincrystal 100''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Coruscating Street]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located inside a small box next to [[Hubel]] in the [[Court of Fontaine]], [[Fontaine]].
